SELECT c.id AS id, c.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickname, u.profile_image AS profile_image, c.title AS title, c.content AS content, c.thumbnail AS thumbnail, c.creation_date AS creationDate, COUNT(DISTINCT l.id) AS likeCount, COUNT(DISTINCT cm.id) AS commentCount FROM book_collection c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN like_list l ON c.id = l.target_id AND l.like_type = 3 LEFT JOIN book_collection_comment cm ON c.id = cm.collection_id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT c.id AS collection_id, c.user_id, u.nickname, u.profile_image, c.title, c.content, c.thumbnail, c.creation_date, lc.like_count, cc.comment_count, b.id AS book_id, b.book_api_id AS book_api_id, b.title AS book_title, cb.thumbnail AS book_thumbnail FROM book_collection c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT target_id AS collection_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM like_list WHERE like_type = 3 GROUP BY target_id ) lc ON c.id = lc.collection_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT collection_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM book_collection_comment GROUP BY collection_id ) cc ON c.id = cc.collection_id LEFT JOIN book_collection_book cb ON c.id = cb.collection_id LEFT JOIN book b ON cb.book_id = b.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
